Name: Legend50210
Film Description: When your only friend begins to show their true colors, when is it time to draw the line? Alpha, a protogen designed by his close ally "Genie" tasks him with bringing down a corrupt government funded corporation with expertise use of martial arts and environmental combat.

Name: Honk Studios
Film Description: An upcoming comedy series completely made by the Latin American community in VRChat.

Name: TriniManBrandon
Film Description: An adventure-comedy film that tells the story of Lunakei's usage of VRChat as a coping mechanism to real life stresses (Lunakei represents the average VRChat player). This movie shows her struggle between living a normal life and living an entirely virtual one. She eventually seeks the help of VRChat's greatest player, TriniManBrandon, when she sees what VR obsession has done to "certain players". Little does she know, there is a mastermind behind these obsessions.

Name: Virtual
Film Description: FoxxWire is an upcoming two-hour-long, sci-fi, action-comedy film that follows the story of ex-assassin Daniel Foxx. After his wife gets killed in a house robbery, he with his kids try to find answers. The three find a particular crystal, trouble, and secret organization while dealing with a multiversal threat in the process.

Name: Crow_Se7en

Name: Greybell
Film Description: That's how we communicate our truth one step at a time. Greybell, a socially awkward metaverse dweller, is feeling down because he grows apart from his old friends. One day, Greybell decides to go to Effective Communication class, where he meets Teacher, Ms. Kardasim, Comfort Cobra, and more! There, he gains confidence, makes new friends, and learns to communicate effectively... by dancing! Effective Communication is a fanmade VRChat music video by Greybell, inspired by the official video by the original artist, JORDANN.

Name: RaenyVisualz
Film Description: The taidum is a rare species, with an exterior fluffiness to it. They have a inquisitive mind, you can see it erupting from their eyes. Very friendly creatures but can negate a negative influence if you're not careful. They can often found in groups, up to who knows, what kind of trouble.
